CompositeFrame.Name: Fares for NIBS:PF0006113:67:475
CompositeFrame.Description: NIBS NIBS:PF0006113:67:475 is accessible as a single trip fare. Prices are given zone to zone, where each zone is a linear group of stops, i.e. fare stage.
